content.en:
Description

Unlike similar projects, IPINION will address the problem of structuring and interpreting Web information by complementing automatic sentiment analysis with subtle ad-hoc linguistic analysis.

Context

Nowadays tools availableÂ  for analysing the dynamics of opinion that are present on the Web, are often too basic.

Objectives

To develop a toolkit of tools and methods to investigate opinion dynamics on the Web. Such toolkit will be offered as a commercial service to small and medium size enterprises.
